title: SAUCEBERRIe MOON: A little wish with a LOT of heart!
description: The SAUCEBERRIe Moon series is the transcribed life and times of the enigmatic being we all know as “the moon.” Most people believe that the moon is just a big ball of light that illuminates the night sky. But those who have talked to her know better. We know that she’s alive! And we know that she’s much more than what meets the eye.Her name is Genie Moon, and if you know just the right way to talk to her... and the kind of payment she accepts... she’ll grant your wishes.Every. Single. One.
author: Tilesha Brown
